sections.heading: to release.A powerholder may release a power of appointment, in whole or in part, except to the extent the terms of the instrument creating the power prevent the release

sections.text:
30-4626.Authority to release.

A powerholder may release a power of appointment, in whole or in part, except to the extent the terms of the instrument creating the power prevent the release.

SourceLaws 2021, LB501, ยง 49.
